actions.text: Submitted in the Senate and ordered held at the desk.
Indefinitely postponed by Senate by Unanimous Consent.

official_title: A resolution regarding the United States response to the Argentine invasion of the Falkland Islands.

summary.text: Expresses the sense of the Senate that the President should embargo trade between the United States and Argentina if Argentina does not implement the Security Council Resolution calling for the withdrawal of Argentine troops from the Falkland Islands. States that such embargo should continue until Argentina implements the Resolution or until the United Kingdom declares the crisis resolved.

titles.title: A resolution regarding the United States response to the Argentine invasion of the Falkland Islands.
